description: A layout component file for a Qwik framework application, defining caching behavior, route loader, and rendering the page structure with header and footer components.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests, sets cache control headers to optimize caching for the route.

methods.name: useServerTimeLoader
methods.description: Loads server time data to be used within the component, providing current date-time as an ISO string.
